title: Integrated Language Education Strategies in the Era of Technological Change

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational knowledge related to professional fields
context.additional_context: A focus on professional language usage scenarios within a smartphone-based VR simulation environment.

learning_goals: Learners improve practical communication skills by at least 40% through profession-specific (medical/legal/technical) situational language use simulations.
Analyze the educational applicability of technology-based teaching tools and propose at least three effective language learning strategies.
Learners utilize culturally contextualized language expressions in VR environments with 90% accuracy.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
